      • isReportColumnAvailable

        public boolean isReportColumnAvailable(ReportParams params,
                              String column)
        Description copied from interface: ReportManager
        Check if a given column is displayable (has data) for the specified report parameters.
        Specified by:
        isReportColumnAvailable in interface ReportManager
        Parameters:
        params - Object containing specific report parameters (see ReportParams)
        column - Column name (see StatsManager.T_SITE, StatsManager.T_USER, StatsManager.T_EVENT, StatsManager.T_RESOURCE, StatsManager.T_RESOURCE_ACTION, StatsManager.T_DATE, StatsManager.T_LASTDATE, StatsManager.T_TOTAL)
        Returns:
        True if column has data and can be displayed; false otherwise

      • getReportDefinitions

        public List<ReportDef> getReportDefinitions(String siteId,
                                   boolean includedPredefined,
                                   boolean includeHidden)
        Description copied from interface: ReportManager
        Load report definitions for a specific site from DB.
        Specified by:
        getReportDefinitions in interface ReportManager
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id or null to load default (global) report definitions.
        includedPredefined - If true, predefined report definitions will also be included
        includeHidden - If true, hidden report definitions will also be included
        Returns:
        A list of report definitions.
